summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4421 for the improvement of Holly Place Southwest, from West Willow Street to West Holly Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52238, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
